meanings.definition: A small piece of cloth or plastic worn by babies to protect their clothing while eating.
meanings.sent1: The baby's bibb caught all the food that fell while eating.
meanings.sent2: She quickly fastened the bibb around the baby's neck before mealtime.
meanings.sent3: The bibb was so big on the baby that it looked like a superhero cape!
meanings.sent4: Her bibb was like a shield, protecting her clothes from any spills.
meanings.sent5: The colorful bibb made the baby look even more adorable.

meanings.definition: A type of lettuce with loose, tender leaves.
meanings.sent1: The salad was made with fresh bibb lettuce from the garden.
meanings.sent2: He enjoyed a delicious sandwich with bibb lettuce as the main ingredient.
meanings.sent3: The bibb lettuce in the salad was so tender, it practically melted in his mouth.
meanings.sent4: The bibb lettuce leaves were like delicate green clouds on the plate.
meanings.sent5: The crispness of the bibb lettuce added a refreshing crunch to the dish.
